name: Poke Crisis
description:
From the image to the skill release, they are perfectly restored. Skill full-screen effects, game background music and skill sound effects give you full feedback. Upgrades and evolutions, and has built-in special monster training directions such as rising stars, upgrading products, and monster individual value training, so that you truly have your own unique monster team!

A variety of native maps in the game, an open world view, super high degree of freedom, forests, oceans, and cities full of modern style are for you to explore. Randomly encounter different mysterious monsters under different times and weathers. Don't hesitate to subdue them immediately Turn them into a part of your powerful team, clear the main storyline missions and sideline missions, obtain massive resources to cultivate monsters, improve combat effectiveness, and win the battle in fierce battles!
